Class ReadOnlyEhcacheCollectionRegionAccessStrategy

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.ehcache.hibernate.strategy.ReadOnlyEhcacheCollectionRegionAccessStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hibernate.cache.access.CollectionRegionAccessStrategy
public class ReadOnlyEhcacheCollectionRegionAccessStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.hibernate.cache.access.CollectionRegionAccessStrategy

Ehcache specific read-only collection region access strategy

Author:
Chris Dennis
